name: Jicama Mango Salad with Cilantro and Lime
author: GF mama
summary: A crisp and refreshing jicama salad, this salad goes really well with any Mexican or Asian dish.
ingredients: 1 large jicama, peeled and cut into matchsticks
1 small red bell pepper, cut into matchsticks
1 large firm mango, peeled and cut into matchsticks
½  red onion, cut into matchsticks
⅛ teaspoon cayenne pepper, or more to taste
directions: Toss jicama, red pepper, mango, and red onion together in a large bowl
Stir cilantro, lime juice, honey, salt, and cayenne pepper together in a bowl
Pour the cilantro mixture over the jicama mixture and toss to coat
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 15 minutes
